name: 黃儀婷
objective:
This course is a weekly seminar discusses the current progress of individual projects.
Sometimes we need to visit a specific showcase to understand current interactive technologies and innovative applications, just like  Huashan 1914 Creative Park, Songshan Cultural and Creative Park and National Taiwan Science Education Center in Taipei.

scorePolicy:
